rows.name:
Dear friends! Morumo reaffirm dream
to make Formide Shopping Ward
biggest trade center in Alst, beating
Pyrithium Trade Guild in process!

Thanks to friends, shop of Obibi
is very successful! If friends ever
have need for textiles or hats,
please to stop by!

Dekudeku's Walky-Walky pilgrimage
is go very well! Dekudeku want to learn
all about business and take learnings
back to Voltis Trade Guild.

The shelter we built in the basement
of my inn should stand up to a pretty
strong assault. You don't need to worry
about this town. We'll protect it.

Thanks for cheering Joey up! What I
really want is to be able to get along
with everyone. I'm gonna try hard, like
Laura does, to make that happen!

Nice one getting those Armus home
safely. I promise not to try any more
strange experiments! I do wish Teeco
would stop meddling, though...

It's great that I'm all better now, but
the best thing is that my mum isn't
sad anymore. Thanks for making her
smile again.

Gwahaha! I'd say it reflects well on the
Iiran army that we had such great
gatekeepers working for us! We need to
keep it up and keep recruiting the best!

I'm glad to have gotten praise from the
squad leader, Onyx. But, truth be told,
it's still hard getting acknowledged
by the one person who matters...

Thanks for helping me understand
Chalcedon's true feelings. We'll
continue to guard the peace as
brothers- no, as comrades.

Cheers for helping my nan out.
Apparently she's recently taken to
walking the Outrider's Forest Trail.
Sounds like she's enjoying herself a lot.

I need to learn not to rely on Chairman
Morumo too much. I'm going to
work on my own contributions to
the shopping ward. For Formide!

Wow, we owe Chairman Morumo more
than I thought... I better do my part, so
tell me if there's anything I can do!
Except discounts. I don't do those.

Thanks for giving me the courage to
trust a little more. Whatever else
happens, I'll treasure that courage
for the rest of my life.

Thank you for helping the chairman.
It's thanks to him that I can continue
making my instruments. I owe him.
But I'll be sure to cheer you on, too!

Everyone encouraged me so much,
I feel a lot more confident now! I'm
gonna keep learning about insects and
machines until I'm an expert in both!

Thanks to you, I'm confident I'll be able
to keep inventing for many years to
come. Feel free to come to me with any
machinery-related problems in future!

Thanks again for updating me on the
state of the fish and of my marriage!
I'll go work on that for now, but we all
should fish at Coolley Lake sometime!

My fishbrain of a husband is still his old
self, but thanks to you all he's at least
been trying to help out lately. Maybe I
can try to cut him some slack, too...

I never thought I'd make a new friend
at my age. I should've had more faith!
But first things first... I think I'll go help
my oaf apprentice with his boat.

My Divine Beast ship is complete, and it's all
thanks to you! Now, if the unthinkable
happens, I'll ferry Aurium's people out
of Iira and to safety. Count on it!

Never thought I'd see the day I'd get
told off by my own daughter. But me
and her, we've got our own paths.
Thanks for showing me that.

Thank you for the help, the forest trail
is my favorite ambling spot! I know the
kids aren't the bad sort, but I do worry
a bit... Hope you can look out for them!

Training of resist army is toughstuff,
but Ryuuryuu is happy to be of assist.
Four Muskerpon have long way to go
yet, but have determination and grit!

Yo, I finally made the cut! The old lady
works us hard, but I know I've got what
it takes to one day be a righteous doer
of good, just like you dudes! Word up!

I'm still processing my teacher's death,
but I'll try my best to make him proud,
and you can take that to the bank.
Thank you all for being here for me.

Prince Adel! Such sterling work!
The gardens look just like they've not
been attacked by an Aegis! Super!
The people of the capital give thanks!

Thanks for getting some sense into my
fool of a son, your lordships. I'd love to
build a magnificent garden for you, if
you'd let me. ...No, if you'd let *us*.

I'm finally back on my feet emotionally
and able to focus on my cooking, and
it's all your doing. Please stop by some
day and try my Tricolor Acqua Pazza!

I feel like a bloody great weight's been
lifted from my heart, mates. Before, I
was living for revenge, but now I have
a new purpose - crushing the Lobsters.

You managed to help Seiryuu? The
problems of an 800-year-old can't be
easy to fix. I really wonder what made
that monster target him, though...

With help of friends, Momimi able to
lend promised money to biggipon. Joy!
Future looking bright for MMMM, eh?
Is maybe time for Momimi to go live!

Thanks to you champions, I will finally
be able to do true love justice on my
lute! Thank you so much! Ahh, love
is such a wondrous thing...

Maybe I could learn something from
Leo's single-mindedness. Thanks for
helping the poor bast- I mean, thanks
for helping my partner out.

My Comprehensive Guide to the Unique
Monsters of Alst is ready at long last!
Thanks for your help, everyone!
...Any suggestions for my next guide?

Chairman Morumo somehow have lot
more pep than usual. Popolo will try
to keep up, but not try too hard
because Popolo have own life to live.

After all these years, who could have
thought I'd move in with Teo again?
Acedia's blessings be with all of you,
wherever the ether takes you...

All right! I promise I'll take what you
taught me and be the best warehouse
watchman you've ever seen, my Lord!
So please keep my slacking a secret!

If it wasn't for you, I'd not be able to
watch the fish swimming like this...
Thanks! I'll make sure the fish you gave
me grow up as big and brave as you!

I knew Ms. Kozel's food would be
exceptional, but Shin and Hikari's was
a surprise treat, so thank you for that!
Superbian food will have its day too!

Thankings for copious feedings!
Now Morimori grow bigger and healthier!
Grow big and healthy is like job for
littlepon, so many thankings to friends!

Big thank-you for talking to musician
friend on behalf of Rikoko. Rikoko now
on fast track to become famous bard!
Please come see Rikoko perform!

Jelyco really reminds me of his sister,
Brigitte - she had a real fiery streak.
I'm gonna keep helping people out,
and maybe it'll make up for the past.

I can't thank your lordships enough for
bringing us that Dragon Incense and
curing my little Freja. Adel, take care
of that wife and babe of yours, OK?

Thank you for reuniting me with Kai
and Kei. I am in your debt. It'll be
hard to raise them without my Nelly,
but you gave me something to live for.

The medicine you brought us has saved
numerous lives already. My thanks!
I knew you were a man of the people,
King- Ah, I mean Prince Adel. *wink*

With the food you've helped me get to
Aletta, the resistance is saved! Thanks!
Uh? Of course I'm not nibbling! What
gave you that... *munch* *gulp* ...idea?

Now our food stores are flush, we're
ready to face what's ahead. From now
on, we'll try to fix our issues ourselves!
While there's booze, there's hope!

When I see my grandmother next, I plan
on telling her all about you all! Better
yet, I think I shall write a book, so the
kids of tomorrow know your greatness!

We believe in the future you stand for,
Prince Adel, everyone! I know me
and Karina don't add up to much, but
our devotion to you is second to none!

Those recruits you dug up for me have
really come through. Rest assured that
the resistance army is in good hands
with me while you're away!

Noel and I aren't all that yet, but we
do what we can, for the glory of the
militia! So...you go and turn that
Metsu into mincemeat for us, yeah?

Da was alive! I can't believe it! Tell you
the truth, I wasn't sure I could protect
Kei by myself... But we'll be all right
now that we're with Da!

You found our da for us! That was so
nice of you! You're even nicer than
Auntie Rynea, and she was, like,
like, SUPER nice...

Thank friends for helping Dudan with
get-rich-quick scheme! Dudan guess
that mean, is now actually rich? Enough
rich to eat delicious meat every day?

Well, sonny boy sure made something
of himself! Building boats to help folks
and such reminds me of his old master.
Ticks all my boxes, he does...

You've helped me grow a little bit as
a Driver. Thanks a bunch! I wonder
where in the world Kaede-chan and I will
go next...?

Thanks to you, Rita's taken her first
step toward becoming a fully-fledged
Driver. She's got a long way to go yet,
but she'll get there one day.

I'm grateful for your help collecting the
machine parts. I even managed to fix
my old Seeker with the spare bits, so
I'll be back in business soon!

My research on ether miasma continues
apace, thanks to your contribution!
After that, my next project will be
Blades that can control ether, I believe.

Now Punpun can nap in safety and
undisturbance! If friends ever need
help with, say, mowing of lawn, Punpun
happy to repay debt, so not to hesitate!

I can't believe we managed to solve
the mystery of the Dannagh Desert!
I suppose I'll need to find a new
mystery now. Any ideas?

Sincerest thanks for reuniting Mirei
and me. We don't have long left, but
I'll make the most of our final days so
I've no regrets when the time comes...

Man, but those monsters were a pain!
Thanks for clearing the way for me!
Dad and I work in the capital's gardens,
so stop by if you're ever in the area!

Looks like the map that Nopon sold me
wasn't actually hogwash. Great, cause
I already bought another one, this time
to an island with actual golden berries!

Them monsters are getting fierce lately.
I'm glad I asked you for help, else my
son might not've made it... Though I do
feel bad about going round Teo's back.

I knew you'd be the ones to uncover
Blue Barney's stash, soon as I saw you.
Hope you'll find the rest of 'em too -
they should be hidden all over!

Only Prince Adel could discover it
Morumo behind Red Pollen Orbs, then
forgive without spankings! But that just
what Macmac and everyone love about!

This getup is so itchy... Do Iirans
really wear this every day? Hot damn...
Still, if it saves me from death... I'll find
a better life for myself than spying...

Thanks to your efforts, Majesty, our
nation's ties with Gula will grow
stronger than ever... Also, is there any
chance of getting more of that honey...?

Meknes's death is a damn shame, but
it's good you told me. I'd hate to be
forever wondering. We'll all strive in
our duties so further tragedy is avoided.

I vow to one day become the kind of
soldier that others can look up to. My
memory will stand as monument to
my efforts! Just you wait and see!

That meal was so delicious, I feel like
I could repair an entire fleet now!
If you're ever in Superbia, you must
let me treat you to some home cooking!

Truly, I am humbled by your kindness.
I shall strive henceforth to maintain
positive relations between Gula
and Superbia, I swear it...

Isn't Rita awesome? She's kind of
become my role model. I think I'll
swing by Iira on my way to Invidia
and pay her a visit!

Hey, you actually got a knighthood!
Go you! Don't let it go to your head,
though. Let's stay true to each other,
and reach for the stars!

I hope Kei and Kai are happy now
that they're back with their father.
I'll have to take a leaf out of your book
and start being more charitable, too...

So you're a Knight of Iira now...
But our friendship is so deeply rooted,
that must make me a knight, too! ...No?
Oh come on, you can let a man dream...

Cannot express with mouthwords
how happy Dolala to be friends with
friends! Dolala will aim higher than
ever before to become great Driver!

You gotta beat Metsu and come back
safely, Master Adel! Same goes for
you, Kasumi. Mik and I'll be cheering you
both on!

Everyone better come back soon.
Sitting around and waiting is so
boring. I hate it.

You are our last, best hope, my friends.
The future of Iira, and indeed all of
Alst, rests on your shoulders.

Thanks for helping my dad out
before! My belly was full and happy
for the first time in a long while!

Lord Adel, Laura-sama... The fate of
Iira is in your hands. With the Aegis
and the Paragon of Iira on your side,
there is nothing to fear! ...Right?

No emperor in the history of Superbia has ever garnered this much
trust and respect from foreigners...
Emperor Hugo, luck be with you, sire!

Thanks for rolling with my old man's
whimsy. He's nuts for nuts and bolts...
I don't think he even knows what I do.
It's kinda sad... But family's family!

I can't believe you beat the golden
monsters! Makes me feel better about
being rudely disturbed like that. Shows
of force always perk me right up!

Sorry much about big job hullabaloo!
But at least now that friends undergo
coaching from master warrior Gororo,
should have confidence to beat anyone!

I can't apologize enough for my Driver.
Still, watching your flawless style and
flair has inspired me. We'll work hard
so we can show you guys up some day.
